json_structure_validator.description: Validates that the response is valid JSON with required story structure

story_quality_metrics.description: Evaluates story quality and keyword integration

story_agent_specifics: Response must be valid JSON parseable
Must contain exactly 4 scenes with indices 1-4
Each scene must have title, description, text fields
Main characters array must have detailed visual descriptions
Story text should integrate provided keywords naturally
Total word count should be 100-200 words as specified in agent instructions
trajectory_expectations: Story agent uses direct LLM response (no tools)
Response should be immediate and complete
